title: Michelle Kim
author: Ochsner Health
description: Ochsner Health System is southeast Louisiana's largest non-profit, academic, multi-specialty, healthcare delivery system.
cleaned_text: Michelle Kim, DACM, LAc Doctor of Acupuncture and Chinese Medicine, Licensed Acupuncturist Michelle Kim holds a Doctorate in Acupuncture and Chinese Medicine from Pacific College of Health and Sciences. She also earned master's degrees in Chinese and Japanese Acupuncture as well as Herbal Medicine from the New England School of Acupuncture. She is certified in both Oncology Acupuncture and Sports Acupuncture using Korean Medicine. She holds the title of Diplomate in Oriental Medicine by the National Certification Committee of Acupuncture and Oriental Medicine and is certified by the Council of Colleges of Acupuncture and Oriental Medicine in Clean Needle Technique. Michelle has interned at the Cambridge Health Alliance hospital in Massachusetts and completed a post-graduate residency program at Kyung-Hee University College of Oriental Medicine in Seoul, South Korea. Specializing in pain management, acute and chronic conditions, musculoskeletal pain, fertility and facial acupuncture, Michelle Kim brings to treatment a focus on helping patients achieve personal wellness and healing.
